name: com.heath.lattice
description:
Adds Lattice Modifiers to Unity.
Using the project panel, take a look at the README within 'Packages/Lattice Modifier' to view the included documentation.

samples.description: A rubber duck going through a pipe.
An example of a skinned lattice modifier and the difference between applying before skinning and after.
A cardboard box being squashed by a cash register.
An example of the visual difference between interpolations types.
An example between global and non-global deformation.
Some cloth swaying in the wind, with a sphere pushing it around. Contains an example for controlling lattices from script.
An example of the different UpdateModes of a modifier and an example of controlling them from scripts.
An example of using a transform lattice modifier to control a light source.
An interactive demo of deforming a face with blend shapes using spring physics.
An example of using vertex color masks.
A wiggly elephant with a vase on it.
